ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Having problems changing billing info
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Stephanie, Yea, you have to do it that way now. I just started back up too and it threw me off a little at first. I was having issues with my video settings
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Stephanie,
Yea, you have to do it that way now. I just started back up too and it
threw me off a little at first. I was having issues with my video
settings and was getting the "eqgame.exe has generated errors" message
and it was driving me nuts! I finally had to boost my paging file size
and do a couple of other things but it finally started working.

You should be able to just use your old station name and pword, I was
able to after 5 months of being gone.

Good luck and happy adventuring!

Steve

EverQuest@yahoogroups.com wrote:
_____________________________________________________________
>
> Message: 1
> Date: Sun, 05 Sep 2004 01:21:12 -0000
> From: "Stephanie" <emtbstephanie@...>
> Subject: Having problems changing billing info
>
> Just updated the game since I haven't played in months. i need to
> change my billing info and when i follow the "click on account, then
> click on change account, then login" directions, I can't even get
> that far. I click on "account" and I get this pop up station.com
> website in my browser.
>
> I am about to SCREAM...I can finally get back in game and it won't
> let me!
>
>
> Please help.....having major game withdrawals over here :(
>
